message: Hello Bob, I believe this product could be of significant value to your operations. I'm initially offering it to you for $1,300,000.  I'm confident it will bring you a substantial return on your investment.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to make a more substantial saving. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for the product. I believe this price is still a good value considering the product's worth to me.
Bob, I understand your desire for a significant saving, but my initial offer reflects the true value of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,100,000?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to make a significant saving. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product. I believe this price is still a good value considering the product's worth to me.
